title: After doing laundry and using laundry detergent if I was to use my hands right after and there was any residue on my hands would it melt my iPhone screen especially if the detergent had bleach or Oxiclean in it? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. It wouldn’t melt. The pH rating of a detergent is typically 10, iPhones can withstand bases up to 11.5 or so
